metadata.name: #01 – We are for Peace
metadata.description:
Candid fleeting moment capturing the dove flying behind my family backs, while they're looking at the horizon

**Genesis piece, 1 / 1**  
St Julian's Bay, Malta, Jan. 2021  
Leica M6 TTL, Kodak Portra 400, 35mm film

We are not against war — we are for Peace 🕊️

We don't fight for slavery — we fight for Liberty 💙

It's a time of triumph over fear — time for Truth 💛

We're more United than ever — we care, we fight, we share, we Love 💔 

Therefore we're destined to Stand with Dignity 🌻

Glory to Ukraine 🇺🇦✨

The collection comprises **108** unique images ✨  
Candid shots, some are well recognizable in photography
